newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures end short day mostly lower.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures end short day mostly lower.

text.p: Nov 29 - IMM currency futures closed the holiday-shortened session mostly lower and in the lower portion of the session ranges. Carryover pressure from Thursday's strength in the dollar pressured currencies, traders said. However, many traders were absent after the holiday, and support near $0.6499 in December marks and $0.008755 in Dec yen held. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
